snippet.title: Zen Zen Zense (English Cover)【Will Stetson】「前前前世」
snippet.description:
A song about continuing to chase an ageless dream.
Support me on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/willstetson
Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/QVf2cmj ↓↓↓

Hi!

Kimi No Na Wa is without a doubt one of my favorite movies of all time. When I heard RADWIMPS' cover of it, I knew I had to sing it at some point, so here it is. Enjoy!

Music: RADWIMPS
Vocals/Mixing: Will Stetson
Editing: Ed Ho
Lyrics: David Toth

My Gear ↓↓↓
Blue Compass Boom Arm: https://amzn.to/38twvhV
Blue Baby Bottle Condenser Mic: https://amzn.to/3ak2FxT
AKG P120 Condenser Mic: https://amzn.to/3afgCgu
Shure SM58 Dynamic Mic: https://amzn.to/38hKsPF
Scarlett 4i4 Audio Interface: https://amzn.to/2u6HdvH
Scarlett Solo Audio Interface: https://amzn.to/2txeyQm
Blue 10-FT XLR Cable: https://amzn.to/2Ru9gNB

Lyrics:
I wonder if you’ve opened your eyes?
Cause it seems that even so your far off gaze will never cross with mine.
“You’re late again…” you shouted at me
Even though I ran with all my might to see you smiling beautifully.
Seems this heart of mine had gotten here before I even knew to leave.

Just to see your face, your hair, your eyes, before me standing there it hurts me so
Just to breathe with you and live in this moment is fine and I won’t let it go.
To the voice that has been calling me since ever so long ago
Just what is it I’ll say to you when first we’ll meet to let you know

For countless lives gone by I’ve searching for you before either of us two had been born
I never forgot that awkward smile you showed me it’s been pushing me on even to this day.
And if you lose your way from the path you came and scatter far along the wind
I swear that I’ll find you somewhere so we can always share together this life we’re in.
Or wipe it away destroy the path that we came and start this world all over again.

Where oh where here should I begin
To tell you all of the things you missed while you were still off sleeping in?
This story spans for thousands of years
It’s a story of the two of us that finally has brought us here.
I can see your shape reflected in these eyes of mine now crystal clear.

Want to joke around and play and laugh with a you far away you’ve never met
I will hold you ever close to me and smile through all the pain and regret
Even though the stars and time had pushed us so far away
We met and I will hold your hand to keep you close and make you stay.

For countless lives gone by I’ve searching for you before either of us two had been born
I heard all the tears you cried alone in the dark and followed on to try and wipe away that fear.
But we are here right now and the world will change cause not a single thing could stand in our way.
If I were to lose you I would never give up and start along on the road again.
Because in an instant you had stolen my fear so I could go on to reach the end.

Countless lives I’ve been searching on to find the future that together we’d stay
I never forgot that awkward smile you showed me it’s been pushing me on even to this day.
Cause if you lose your way from the path you came and scatter far along the wind
I swear that I’ll find you I will never give in I’ll start along on the road again.
Keep humming this song as many lives it will take for us to finally reach the end.


Instrumental can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FKu_r1MwX5k

Support me on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/willstetson

Follow me on Twitter! https://twitter.com/willstetson78

I do not own the background image.
